name: PolyTower
description:
In PolyTower you're running a corporation and balancing its resources to build a tower that both generates revenue and supports itself at the same time. In this turn-based strategy game, you must use careful planning to efficiently structure your tower room by room and expand your business. How tall can you build your tower?

HOW TO PLAY

The game currently does not have a tutorial. This is how you play:

The goal is build your tower by stacking rooms on top of each other as high as you can before running out of resources. Only the top 5 rows of rooms are active throughout the whole game, so eventually old rooms do not require or provide resources.  A rooms "service" (indicated by the number in the bottom right of the room) must be met before it can be pushed below the 5th row mark.

Office Room - Costs 2k and 1 Staff, provides 2k each round its powered.

Break Room - Costs 3k and 0 Staff, provides 2 service to rooms in its row, and 1 service to rooms in its column

Server Room - Costs 5k and 0 Staff, provides 1 service to rooms in its column only if powered. If powered, provides 4 Staff when it expires (moves from an active row to inactive)

Electrical Room - Costs 8k and 1 Staff, provides power to all rooms in its column.
